channel.title: Barnes Nursery - Huron, Ohio
channel.description: Barnes Nursery Inc. is a fantastic, family-owned, company that offers a comprehensive range of horticultural services.

item.title: Fall Plant Sale
item.description: FALL PLANT SALE Come enjoy 25% OFF in-stock Trees, Shrubs and Perennials. New fall arrivals are not included in this sale.
item.content:encoded:
FALL PLANT SALE

Come enjoy 25% OFF in-stock Trees, Shrubs and Perennials.

New fall arrivals are not included in this sale.
